subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: It was billed as the game of the season, with the league’s brightest stars squaring off, Kobe Bryant versus LeBron James. But it didn’t take long for the holiday face-off to turn ugly.
snippet: It was billed as the game of the season, with the league’s brightest stars squaring off, Kobe Bryant versus LeBron James. But it didn’t take long for the holiday face-off to turn ugly.
